channel.title: Formus guide
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]THIS GUIDE WILL HELP U MAKE YOUR OWN FORMUS![/glow]
step1. go to http://www.smfforfree2.com/free-forum.php
step2.u should get a form fill it out
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?srv=img03&img=/7/3/6/f_yjum_1eded34.png][IMG]http://img03.picoodle.com/img/img03/7/3/6/f_yjum_1eded34.png[/img][/URL] step3. done! now u got your site now ill show u how to edit it.
step4.go to admin and then put in your password
step5.scroll down and on ur left side find boards
step6. then create a new board! such as tuts
now to add rep to your formus step7.go back to admin and put in ur pass like b4
step8.on the left hand side u see features and opsion
step9. click on it and on the top u see a thing called karma click on it then.
[URL=http://www.picoodle.com/view.php?srv=img03&img=/7/3/6/f_e5ym_5338abc.png][IMG]http://img03.picoodle.com/img/img03/7/3/6/f_e5ym_5338abc.png[/img][/URL]
step10. look at my bottom 3 bars to urs copy them
[glow=red,2,300]how to make people mods or admins on formus[/glow] go to members and then click on the person name u wanna make them admin/mod then u will see there profile go to accont related setting and change the group type to global mod or administor and there!
[glow=red,2,300]cant add pic on ur formus or mopar formus and overs?[/glow] go to http://www.picoodle.com/?src=adsense&gclid=CNDFrpj_y4oCFR1TZwodnCLUOg click brows and then pick ur pic and then upload then u get some codes the code u need is hotlink or hotsomethink and there u go =)
[glow=red,2,300]need a kool logo?[/glow] go to http://cooltext.com/ and pick your style and what it says then go to admin on ur formus and then u can find out where to add it its easy but im just being anoying so u can learn how to do things on ur own :p
[glow=red,2,300]hope this helped and smite takes rep of ppl =)[/glow]

item.title: Formus guide
item.dc:creator: @shabz shabz
item.description:
@shabz wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]THIS GUIDE WILL HELP U MAKE YOUR OWN FORMUS![/glow]

step1.
go to http://www.smfforfree2.com/free-forum.php

step2.u should get a form fill it out


step3. done! now u got your site now ill show u how to edit it.

step4.go to admin and then put in your password

step5.scroll down and on ur left side find boards

step6. then create a new board! such as tuts

          now to add rep to your formus

step7.go back to admin and put in ur pass like b4

step8.on the left hand side u see features and opsion

step9. click on it and on the top u see a thing called karma click on it then.

step10. look at my bottom 3 bars to urs copy them

[glow=red,2,300]how to make people mods or admins on formus[/glow]
go to members and then click on the person name u wanna make them
admin/mod then u will see there profile go to accont related setting and
change the group type to global mod or administor and there!

[glow=red,2,300]cant add pic on ur formus or mopar formus and overs?[/glow]
go to http://www.picoodle.com/?src=adsense&gclid=CNDFrpj_y4oCFR1TZwodnCLUOg
click brows and then pick ur pic and then upload then u get some codes the code u
need is hotlink or hotsomethink and there u go =)

[glow=red,2,300]need a kool logo?[/glow]
go to http://cooltext.com/
and pick your style and what it says then go to admin on ur formus
and then u can find out where to add it its easy but im just being anoying so u can learn how to do things on ur own

[glow=red,2,300]hope this helped and smite takes rep of ppl =)[/glow]

Read full topic
